thread.section_title: Floor to Ceiling Carpet One Floor & Home Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Floor to Ceiling Carpet One Floor & Home | www.floortoceilingcarpetonefargo.com
thread.title: Brenda
thread.title_full: Floor to Ceiling Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Brenda

author: Brenda
title: Brenda
text: I was overwhelmed about the idea of replacing our 24 year old laminate kitchen countertop. The wise, patient and detailed professional service from Karen Skauge got me through it!! My husband and I had attended their Open House this fall of 2016 to help narrow down our choices and maybe win a gift certificate. I was fortunate to win a $250.00 gift certificate from Ceramic Tile Works towards a purchase of tile. We purchased Cafe Azul Formica countertop along with Metallic Titanium glass tile for a backsplash. It has transformed our kitchen! We are very satisfied with the products, the service and the installation we have received from Floor to Ceiling Carpet One, Fargo. Thank you!
